diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. Your task is to create a Python program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: Building. The program should implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: architecturalStyle - Example triple: (103 Colmore Row | architecturalStyle | Brutalist architecture)
Predicate: buildingStartDate - Example triple: (103 Colmore Row | buildingStartDate | "1973")
Predicate: completionDate - Example triple: (103 Colmore Row | completionDate | 1976)
Predicate: floorCount - Example triple: (103 Colmore Row | floorCount | 23)
Predicate: location - Example triple: (103 Colmore Row | location | "Colmore Row, Birmingham, England")
Predicate: cost - Example triple: (108 St Georges Terrace | cost | "120 million (Australian dollars)")
Predicate: floorArea - Example triple: (108 St Georges Terrace | floorArea | 39500.0 (square metres))
Predicate: architect - Example triple: (11 Diagonal Street | architect | Helmut Jahn)
Predicate: owner - Example triple: (11 Diagonal Street | owner | Redefine Properties Limited)
Predicate: formerName - Example triple: (320 South Boston Building | formerName | "Exchange National Bank Building")
Predicate: height - Example triple: (320 South Boston Building | height | 121.92 (metres))
Predicate: buildingType - Example triple: (3Arena | buildingType | "Concert and events venue")
Predicate: developer - Example triple: (AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen | developer | Bella Center)
Predicate: tenant - Example triple: (AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen | tenant | Marriott International)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (Adare | isPartOf | Munster)
Predicate: country - Example triple: (Addis Ababa | country | Ethiopia)
Predicate: currentTenants - Example triple: (Addis Ababa City Hall | currentTenants | "Government of Addis Ababa")
Predicate: address - Example triple: (Adisham Hall | address | "St. Benedict's Monastery, Adisham, Haputhale, Sri Lanka")
Predicate: inaugurationDate - Example triple: (Alan B. Miller Hall | inaugurationDate | "2009-10-02")
Predicate: birthPlace - Example triple: (Alfred Giles (architect) | birthPlace | England)
Predicate: deathPlace - Example triple: (Alfred Giles (architect) | deathPlace | Kendall County, Texas)
Predicate: bedCount - Example triple: (Ampara Hospital | bedCount | 476)
Predicate: region - Example triple: (Ampara Hospital | region | Ampara District)
Predicate: state - Example triple: (Ampara Hospital | state | Eastern Province, Sri Lanka)
Predicate: website - Example triple: (Ampara Hospital | website | <http://www.ghampara.gov.lk/>)
Predicate: yearOfConstruction - Example triple: (Asher and Mary Isabelle Richardson House | yearOfConstruction | 1911)
Predicate: NationalRegisterOfHistoricPlacesReferenceNumber - Example triple: (Asilomar Conference Grounds | NationalRegisterOfHistoricPlacesReferenceNumber | "87000823")
Predicate: addedToTheNationalRegisterOfHistoricPlaces - Example triple: (Asilomar Conference Grounds | addedToTheNationalRegisterOfHistoricPlaces | "1987-02-27")
Predicate: significantBuilding - Example triple: (Augustus Pugin | significantBuilding | Palace of Westminster)
Predicate: governingBody - Example triple: (Birmingham | governingBody | Birmingham City Council)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (Birmingham | leader | Andrew Mitchell)
Predicate: chancellor - Example triple: (College of William & Mary | chancellor | Robert Gates)
Predicate: governmentType - Example triple: (County Limerick | governmentType | Limerick City and County Council)
Predicate: capital - Example triple: (Denmark | capital | Copenhagen)
Predicate: language - Example triple: (Denmark | language | Faroese language)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (Dublin | leaderTitle | Dáil Éireann)
Predicate: currency - Example triple: (Ethiopia | currency | Ethiopian birr)
Predicate: ethnicGroup - Example triple: (Japan | ethnicGroup | Chinese people in Japan)
Predicate: origin - Example triple: (John Madin | origin | Birmingham)
Predicate: significantProject - Example triple: (Julia Morgan | significantProject | Hearst Castle)
Predicate: foundationPlace - Example triple: (Marriott International | foundationPlace | Washington, D.C.)
Predicate: demonym - Example triple: (Republic of Ireland | demonym | Irish people)
Predicate: numberOfRooms - Example triple: (AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen | numberOfRooms | 814)
Predicate: keyPerson - Example triple: (Marriott International | keyPerson | Bill Marriott)
Predicate: architecture - Example triple: (Asilomar Conference Grounds | architecture | "Arts and Crafts Movement and American craftsman Bungalows")
Predicate: postalCode - Example triple: (Birmingham | postalCode | B postcode area)

# Current Program
```python
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    sentence = ""
    for i, triple in enumerate(triples):
        if triple.predicate == "architecturalStyle":
            sentence += f"{triple.subject} is built in {triple.object} style."
        elif triple.predicate == "buildingStartDate":
            sentence += f" Construction of {triple.subject} started in {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "completionDate":
            sentence += f" It was completed in {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "floorCount":
            sentence += f" The building has {triple.object} floors."
        elif triple.predicate == "location":
            sentence += f" It is located in {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "cost":
            sentence += f" The cost of the building was {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "floorArea":
            sentence += f" It has a floor area of {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "owner":
            sentence += f" The owner of {triple.subject} is {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "formerName":
            sentence += f" Formerly known as {triple.object}, "
        elif triple.predicate == "height":
            sentence += f" Its height is {triple.object} metres."
        elif triple.predicate == "buildingType":
            sentence += f" {triple.subject} is a {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "developer":
            sentence += f" It was developed by {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "tenant":
            sentence += f" It is currently tenanted by {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "isPartOf":
            sentence += f" It is part of {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "country":
            sentence += f" It is located in {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "currentTenants":
            sentence += f" The current tenants are {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "address":
            sentence += f" The address is {triple.object}."
        elif triple.predicate == "inaugurationDate":
            sentence += f" It was inaugurated on {triple.object}."
        else:
            sentence += f" {triple.subject} {triple.predicate} {triple.object}."

    return sentence

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
```
